body_html: @maplewizard I am in the same situation, I do not have root access. I managed to build bazel binary using a new version (4.8) of gcc installed at custom path. But when I use the bazel binary to compile tensorflow, it does invoke the old gcc compiler from the old system instead of the newer gcc I installed.

body: @maplewizard I am in the same situation, I do not have root access. I managed to build bazel binary using a new version (4.8) of gcc installed at custom path. But when I use the bazel binary to compile tensorflow, it does invoke the old gcc compiler from the old system instead of the newer gcc I installed.
